content.text:

- [x] Research NBA player prop modeling - find statistical approaches that have edge (points, rebounds, assists)
- [x] Research MLB pitcher prop modeling - strikeouts, earned runs, innings pitched
- [x] Identify free/cheap data sources for historical player stats

All completed tasks should be in Completed Tasks section with:
- Completion date: 2026-01-28
- Brief summary of findings (referenced in memory files)

Active Tasks section should be empty or contain only new tasks added after this date.

Check that HEARTBEAT.md file exists at /root/clawd/HEARTBEAT.md and update it properly.
